JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Efficient Production Workers Needed for Day Shifts in Outrup!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for several production workers with quick hands for a company in Outrup. While physical strength is not a requirement, you must be able to communicate in English. If you are reliable, stable, and can handle a fast-paced work environment, please send your CV to Esbjerg-U@jobteam.dk and write "High tempo Esbjerg" in the subject line.

The temporary position will start in week 43 and last until week 50.

Arbejdsopgaver:

  • Efficiently cutting and sorting fresh fish
  • Engaging in dynamic assembly line tasks
  • Conducting quality control to ensure top-notch standards
  • Packing fish with care for a premium finished product

 

Faglige kvalifikationer:

  • Previous experience in production is a plus, but not required
  • Strong ability to work quickly and efficiently
  • English is required for effective communication

 

Personlige kvalifikationer:

  • Proficient in English comprehension and communication
  • No physical strength required – just a positive attitude!
  • Must be dependable and consistently punctual
  • Thrives in a fast-paced work environment with ease

 

Særlige forhold:

  • Work hours are Monday to Friday, from 06:55 to 15:09
  • Salary is 146,15 DKK per hour
  • The temporary position will start in week 43 and last until week 50.

 

Sådan søger du jobbet:

The positions need to be filled as soon as possible, and we are conducting interviews on an ongoing basis.

If this sounds like something for you, send your CV to Esbjerg-U@jobteam.dk and write "High Tempo Esbjerg" in the subject line.

We look forward to hearing from you!
